price: Laiti tungeli pata kurejea tena tungeli kuwa katika Waumini.
arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Basi hapo ndio wanajitamania nafsi zao lau wangeli rejea duniani wapate kuwa Waumini ili waokoke.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falaw anna lanā karratan fanakūna mina al-mu'minīna
